CustomField.description: In ICON ios we display a VOICE icon if there is a survey completed by this client in the past year. The icon will be red or green according to the survey type: green for Delighted. Red for all others.
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(LastVoiceType__c, '' ), ISBLANK(LastVoiceDate__c ) , (TODAY () - LastVoiceDate__c > 365) ) , '' , IF( ISPICKVAL(LastVoiceType__c ,'Delighted Client'), 'GREEN', 'RED' )
)
CustomField.label: TECH Voice Icon
